Birdie just may hold the keys to solving the mystery, but Alden will have to come clean to find out. Only, Alden suspects that Birdie might be hiding secrets of her own.

title: Rye Lane
description: Two twenty-somethings, both reeling from bad break-ups, connect over the course of an eventful day in South London – helping each other deal with their nightmare exes, and potentially restoring their faith in romance.

title: Making Scents of Love
description: A woman falls "head over heels" for a guy after accidentally spilling a vial of her new fragrance, that also might happen to be a love potion.

title: American Cherry
description: A mysterious, troubled boy meets an impressionable girl in their small town. Together they embark on a romance where his love turns into obsession as he tries to protect her from her dysfunctional family -- he makes her a video diary that confesses an intricate story of love, mental illness and the tragic consequences if left untreated.

title: Brother
description: Brother is the story of Francis and Michael, sons of Caribbean immigrants maturing into young men amidst Toronto’s pulsing 1990’s hip-hop scene. A mystery unfolds when escalating tensions set off a series of events which changes the course of the brothers’ lives forever.

title: Still Time
description: Dante accidentally kisses Alice and they get engaged. After a surprise party for his 40th birthday, he wakes up a year later, not remembering what happened. Not only does he discover that Alice is pregnant... He feels time is passing too quickly and he starts forgetting some of the most important moments of his life.

title: 10 Reasons Why Men Cheat
description:
Overview:
                                                In the wake of a wedding catastrophe, three couples discover the meaning of commitment, while discussing what women want to know most of all when it comes to men and relationships.

title: Pretty Crazy
description: A successful, handsome, eligible bachelor is ready to find the one to settle down and build a future with - however, the current dating climate is overwhelming. In the wake of his last relationship, he meets and falls for the perfect girl, but will his past come back to ruin his chances of them building their lives together? Dating as a millennial can be.... Pretty Crazy.

title: Unexpected Grace
description:
Overview:
                                                Grace finds a note from a schoolgirl looking for a friend. Since Grace is still trying to find her place in her new hometown, she excitedly writes back and sets off a chain of events that ultimately changes the lives of three people.

title: Game of Love
description: Audrey, a creative board game designer and Matthew, a research-driven marketing consultant, are tasked with creating a new game to help players find romance. Given just weeks to deliver the project, the pair find that they have very different approaches. However, as they try to work together, they discover something they have in common: they each have a lot to learn about love.

title: Do Your Worst
description: Regret and redemption take center stage as Sondra, struggling actor and professional mess, faces the consequences of a lifetime of her own bad decisions

title: Faraway
description: Zeynep Altin (Naomi Krauss) is at the end of her tether. She’s over-worked and pushed around by her husband, daughter and aging father. Her mother’s death and her funeral, which nearly ends in total disaster, is the last straw for Zeynep – she leaves Munich and escapes to an island in Croatia. In the house her mother bought secretly years ago, and gifted to her in her will, she hopes to find peace, freedom and herself. If only the former owner, Josip, an islander through and through, wasn’t still living on the same property…

title: Married by Mistake
description: After losing her dream job, Riley gets drunk with Nate and the next morning they find themselves married. Accepting Nate's proposal they travel to Tennessee to rescue his family's business, but will they be able to keep up the deception?

title: Here Love Lies
description: In the pursuit of 'love and forever', single parent and Travel Blogger Amanda, embarks on a social media romance with American TourGuide Michael. A trip to the US to meet up for the first time, opens up more doors than both anticipated.

title: Tonight You're Sleeping with Me
description: Stuck in a passionless marriage, a journalist must choose between her distant but loving husband and a younger ex-boyfriend who has reentered her life

title: Royal Rendezvous
description: A Chef from East L.A. received an invitation to a manor in Ireland to cook for a royal banquet that was planned by a Lord to convince his grandmother to sell their home.

title: Sweet on You
description: Kate, a small town pie shoppe owner, encounters city boy Drew who, unbeknownst to Kate, is in town to build tract homes that would run straight through her shoppe… until Drew finds his heart stuck between his family’s wishes and a chance at love.

title: Made for Each Other
description: A sculptor uses magic to mold her ideal man into reality but begins to fall for her human friend and embraces the flaws that make love perfectly imperfect.

title: The Love Club: Tara’s Tune
description: Tara has always considered herself to be a free spirit. Moreover, the talented singer doesn’t seek love. Instead, she has her friends in The Love Club.

title: Mixed Baggage
description: When Evie Jones rushes off a flight to make her connection, she has no idea that in her haste, she has grabbed the wrong green duffel bag. Unbeknownst to her, the flight attendant moved hers, and the one Evie has taken belongs to Jake Weber. Thus ensues a series of mishaps, missed messages and misunderstandings as each tries to get the bag back to its rightful owner.

title: Broken People
description: Broken People (2023)  Brett and Jake meet in a bar and decide to drown their sorrows in whiskey, forgetting the past, ignoring the future, and exploring life, love, and tragedy together for one fateful night.

title: Rent a Groom
description: To fulfill her grandma’s last wish to see her married, Tracey hires a man to play the role of her fiancé. But as their white lie snowballs into a fiasco, the couple’s roleplaying becomes so believable that what starts out as fake, may just be real love.

title: Vaathi
description: An assistant maths teacher takes up a tedious task of transforming underprivileged students despite the politics around education in the 90s.

title: Perfect Addiction
description: A female boxing trainer discovers that her champion cage-fighter boyfriend has been cheating on her with her sister and decides to seek revenge by training up his arch-rival to challenge him.

title: The Love Club: Lauren’s Dream
description: Lauren supported her husband Peter get his career going. This means her dream of opening an art gallery has been put on the back burner. Soon, she becomes so resentful that it tears their marriage apart.

title: Entre el Amor y la Amistad
description: Two best friends, Uche and Toyin, fall in love with Sunday, a charming, yet flawed eligible bachelor. A love triangle ensues with the women unaware that they are dating the same man.

title: A Paris Proposal
description: Emily and Sebastian travel to his hometown of Paris to land the Ad account of famed Durand Diamonds and end up in a tricky situation when the client mistakes them for a happy couple.

title: Somebody I Used to Know
description: On a trip to her hometown, workaholic Ally reminisces with her first love Sean, and starts to question everything about the person she's become. Things only get more confusing when she meets Sean's fiancé, Cassidy, who reminds her of the person she used to be.

title: Your Place or Mine
description: When best friends and total opposites Debbie and Peter swap homes for a week, they get a peek into each other's lives that could open the door to love.

title: Meet Me In Paris
description: Three single friends travel to Paris for two weeks for the journey of a lifetime and in search of true love. From 'meet cutes' at the Luxembourg Gardens, to strolls down the tree-lined Champs-Élysées, will first dates lead to happily ever after or heartbreak?

title: At Midnight
description: Ambitious hotel manager Alejandro and movie star Sophie meet when fate strikes when the shoot brings them all to Alejandro's hotel in Mexico. Despite their radically different lives, Alejandro and Sophie begin to secretly meet at midnight...

title: Of an Age
description: A Serbian ballroom dancer experiences an unexpected and intense 24-hour romance with a friend's older brother.

title: The Blue Caftan
description: Halim has been married to Mina for a long time, with whom he runs a traditional caftan store in the medina (old town) of Salé, Morocco. The couple has always lived with Halim's secret – his homosexuality – about which he has learned to keep quiet. However, Mina's illness and the arrival of a young apprentice upsets this balance. United in their love, each will help the other face his fears.

title: Love In A Pandemic
description: Directed by Akay Mason and written by Abosi Ogba, the film captures a love story that happens amidst one of the most unforgettable moments in human history, the COVID-19 pandemic. It follows the story of Bolanle, who meets Alex, the man of her dreams, but how does their new flame survive the uncertain world of a pandemic?

title: Dear David
description: A secret fantasy blog might jeopardize the promising future of Laras, a talented student, when the blog is revealed to her entire school.

title: My Valentine Crush
description: Woman Has an unexpected connection with an internet technician, leading her to have a Valentine's Day that she'll never forget and evaluate her current relationship with her boyfriend.

title: The Love Club: Sydney’s Journey
description: Sydney has transitioned from a track star to a successful food blogger. Moreover, her heart is still attached to her college boyfriend. However, they have not seen each other in a decade.

title: Magic Mike's Last Dance
description: Mike Lane takes to the stage again after a lengthy hiatus, following a business deal that went bust, leaving him broke and taking bartender gigs in Florida. For what he hopes will be one last hurrah, Mike heads to London with a wealthy socialite who lures him with an offer he can’t refuse… and an agenda all her own. With everything on the line, once Mike discovers what she truly has in mind, will he—and the roster of hot new dancers he’ll have to whip into shape—be able to pull it off?

title: Love on the Reef
description: A smart and serious marine biologist and a fun-loving and laissez-faire dive instructor must team up to save their beloved reef from being destroyed before it’s too late.

title: The Wedding Wish
description: A diehard romantic sets the date for her wedding despite still being single. As she goes on a quest to find a fiancé, she's unaware true love might be right under her nose.

title: One Year Off
description: Claire and her pals are invited to the West Indies by their friend Ben, who just inherited an island getaway. To pass the long days, they start a business hosting beachfront weddings, resulting in both awesome success and hilarious disaster. Meanwhile, the sun and scenery put Claire, Ben, and their posse in the mood for romance. Will the next wedding be one of theirs?

title: The Happy Camper
description: When Dillon's love life falls apart she returns to her grandfather's farm in Colorado, where she works with Jordan, a handsome hardware store owner, to restore a vintage 1960s travel trailer, and along the way, finds new love.

title: Sweeter Than Chocolate
description: A local bakery is rumored to have the secret recipe to finding true love on Feb. 14, drawing in a TV reporter to investigate.

title: Frankie Meets Jack
description: Perpetually single Frankie decides to give up on men in favor of going all-in as a “dog mom.” But when she and her adopted dog, Tucker, cross paths with Jack and his dog, Dakota, she finds it difficult to stick to her resolution.

title: In Your Dreams
description: You know the feeling. It feels like time slows down as your eyes meet a stranger’s. Then you walk pass each other, neither of you looking back. That’s what happened with Pelin and Engin. Lo and behold, they open their eyes in the same bed. And you may want to brace yourself for this one, as a two-year married couple! It must be a dream. No, a nightmare. But now, to wake up they must fall in love.

title: Almost Pyaar with DJ Mohabbat
description: In pursuit of forbidden love, two young couples from different worlds find their lives entangled as rebellion and intolerance collide in dual stories.

title: Erin's Guide to Kissing Girls
description: As middle school is ending, Erin, the only out person in her grade, and Liz, fellow comic nerd and track star, find their friendship tested when Liz is accepted to private high school and Erin falls hard for new girl and ex child-star, Sydni. Erin believes the only way to save herself from certain doom next year is to ask Sydni to the big dance and get in with the popular kids, but the plan goes awry when she starts to lose Liz along the way. Erin’s Guide To Kissing Girls is a story of friendship, first loves, and deciding what’s important to you when everything is changing, all told through a queer lens.

title: She Is Love
description: When Patricia arrives at a country hotel in Cornwall, she encounters her ex husband Idris, who manages the place with his girlfriend Louise. Things are immediately awkward and the former couple reconnect over a long, messy night where they revisit the past while remaining open to new beginnings.

title: Georgia Rock
description: Burning out rock star seeks answers in rural Georgia.

title: The Love Club: Nicole's Story
description: Four women, each dealing with their dating failures, make a promise to call each other if they ever run into romantic trouble again. 10 years later they revive their "Love Club" to help them to find true love.

title: Hypnotique
description: A jaded psychiatrist, guarding a deadly secret, hypnotizes and programs her patients to brutally kill their partners when an implanted response triggers her murderous commands

title: Love in Glacier National: A National Park Romance
description: Sparks fly when Hannah, an expert in avalanche forecasting, brings her new technology to Glacier National Park and faces pushback from the director of Mountain Rescue, who relies more on intuition and common sense. Their dual approach bring more than forecasting to the forefront of their hearts.

title: Fall Into Winter
description: Keely is aghast when her brother sells his half of their family-owned, upscale candy shop to his best friend from high school orcing a sudden urgency to find connection and common ground. Keely has been hurt before; change is her new nemesis. Brooks’ past is a mirror of Keely’s. He, too, has a fortress around his heart. Fate brings the pair together. Might it also offer new beginnings?

title: Maybe I Do
description: Michelle and Allen, who have reached the point in their relationship where they are considering next steps, decide to invite  their parents to finally meet and to offer some understanding of why marriage works. Except the parents already know each other quite well, which leads to some very distinct opinions about the value of marriage.

title: Life Upside Down
description: Three couples, connected by friendship, love and work, are each stuck in their respective homes in Los Angeles during the beginning of lockdown. Finally forced to face their spouses, friends, lovers, and eventually themselves head on, their lives turn slowly but surely upside-down.

title: Temptation
description: Inez is a young, aspiring journalist who dreams of love and a job at a prestigious publishing house. Once she gets to the paradise of her dreams, problems will start to multiply. What's more, two handsome men will appear at her side. Both mysterious and unpredictable.

title: What's Love Got to Do with It?
description:
Overview:
                                                Two childhood friends now in their thirties must decide whether to follow their heads or their hearts once the man decides to follow his parents' advice and enter into an arranged marriage in Pakistan.

title: Unhappily Ever After
description: María José and Alfredo are about to celebrate their 20th anniversary and their children give them a trip to the hotel where they celebrated their honeymoon, but a spell will make them repeat the same day.

title: Luckless in Love
description: Winnie, a dating blogger who anonymously writes under the pen name Luckless, goes viral for a post about a disastrous date with Holden, a perpetually single sports agent who refuses to settle. When Winnie’s boss offers her very own column on the popular lifestyle site, Mush, Winnie has no choice but to keep dating Holden for content. But things get complicated when feelings develop and Winnie learns that Holden has a teenage son.

title: The Wedding Veil Journey
description: Tracy and Nick agree to set aside work to make time for a long overdue honeymoon to Greece. However, they soon find themselves confronting life choices when they get stranded on a secluded island.

title: You People
description: A new couple and their families reckon with modern love amid culture clashes, societal expectations and generational differences.

title: Fijn Weekend
description: A close-knit group of friends gather in French Burgundy to finally scatter ashes of their dead friend. When the widow unexpectedly brings her new boyfriend, the weekend takes a turn, and all friendships and relationships are put on edge.

title: The Wedding Veil Inspiration
description: Emma's plans get thrown off course when Paolo returns to Italy to take care of his father and she discovers a new passion for making art accessible to all.

title: The Princess and the Bodyguard
description: Lexi is devastated when asked to give up her life in New York to resume her secret identity of Royal Princess. Under the watchful eye of a handsome but infuriating bodyguard, will she fulfill her destiny and find love at the same time?

title: Disconnect: The Wedding Planner
description: After falling victim to a scam, a desperate man races the clock as he attempts to plan a luxurious destination wedding for an important investor.

title: Love Evolving
description: An anxious woman navigates the bustle of modern day Cairo to find her missing lover, a young adult strives for an authentic connection in a future society numbed by alcohol, and two Cold War-era lovers face the consequences of finding romance across political borders. A vibrant collection of short films - by turns gritty and dreamlike - exploring the changes and complexities of a Love Evolving.

title: The Wedding Veil Expectations
description: Avery and Peter try to keep the romance alive while renovating the old house they bought and juggling work, but everything takes on a new perspective when they get some news they’ve been hoping for.

title: A Prince in Paradise
description: Olivia, struggling with writer's block after a break up, takes a tropical holiday in hope of some inspiration and meets Prince Alexander, who needs some distance from his duty to marry royalty.

title: Mummies
description: Through a series of unfortunate events, three mummies end up in present-day London and embark on a wacky and hilarious journey in search of an old ring belonging to the Royal Family, stolen by ambitious archaeologist Lord Carnaby.

title: The Dog Lover's Guide to Dating
description: Simon believes Chloe is the girl of his dreams, but can’t seem to win over her beloved pup. He enlists dog trainer Alex and soon finds himself wondering where his real connection might be.

title: The Snowball Effect
description: Vying to be the meteorologist at a nationally syndicated television station, Tara and Sam race to cover an unexpected storm heading their way. When they find themselves stuck in a dilapidated village that Christmas forgot, Tara must learn what is important before she loses both the love and career opportunity of her life.

title: Saving Christmas Spirit
description: When brilliant and sharp-witted archaeologist Lucy Stewart decides to spend her Christmas break in the Scottish Highlands, she goes on a quest to find the ruins of a shrine to ancient goddess Beira the Queen of Winter.

title: Hanukkah on Rye
description: A matchmaker connects Molly and Jacob, but their new romance is put to the test when they realize that they are competing deli owners. Will a Hanukkah miracle keep them together?

title: When Christmas Was Young
description:
Overview:
                                                The story follows a headstrong music manager in desperate need of a hit song for his last remaining client, who finds himself falling for a gifted singer-songwriter with abandoned dreams of making it big, as he attempts to secure the rights to a Christmas song she wrote years ago.

title: A Brush with Christmas
description: Charlotte captures the local art scene also helping mother run the family restaurant. Charlotte throws out her painting, to the Christmas art festival. Wyatt seeing her discarded work tries to find the mysterious artist who stole his heart.

title: Sappy Holiday
description: When a hard-working but uninspired sous chef accidentally discovers her boyfriend is going to propose to her on Christmas Eve, she begins doubting their future together; especially when a handsome maple farmer rescues her from a snowstorm.

title: The Holiday Dating Guide
description: Dating coach and aspiring book author Abigale Slater is tasked by her publisher Jack to prove that her dating advice really works. With that, she decides to make a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days. When she Michael Ryan, her single-minded mission takes an unexpected turn.

title: Five More Minutes: Moments Like These
description: The second holiday story inspired by Scotty McCreery’s song “Five More Minutes,” a young widow’s Christmas wish for her son is answered in unexpected ways when she returns to their old home for the holidays.

title: 'Twas the Night Before Christmas
description: A former actress trying to break into directing tests her skills with a town’s annual Christmas Eve courtroom production in which the true authorship of the famous poem “A Visit from St. Nick” is debated.

title: Aisle Be Home for Christmas
description: Two exes finally reconnect when a snowstorm leaves them stranded in a superstore (without cell service or Wi-Fi) just before Christmas.

title: A Christmas to Treasure
description: The passing of a beloved old neighbor reunites six friends for a hometown holiday treasure hunt, where sparks fly once again between brand strategist Austin and his former best friend Everett.

title: Holiday Heritage
description: Ella returns to her hometown to mend fences with her fractured family. With the help of Griffin, her ex-boyfriend, she encourages her family to celebrate Christmas and Kwanzaa and to heal their past wounds before it’s too late.

title: Record Breaking Christmas
description: Working for the World Record Bureau, Leah Hoffman is forced to travel to a small town just before Christmas to investigate its plans to break multiple holiday world records. While there, she falls for the town’s doctor, Devan Bancroft.

title: Megalodon: The Frenzy
description: When a frenzy of five Megalodons torment the open ocean, the stakes have never been higher.

title: Babylon 5: The Road Home
description: Travel across the galaxy with John Sheridan as he unexpectedly finds himself transported through multiple timelines and alternate realities in a quest to find his way back home. Along the way he reunites with some familiar faces, while discovering cosmic new revelations about the history, purpose, and meaning of the Universe.

title: The Monkey King
description: A stick-wielding monkey teams with a young girl on an epic quest for immortality, battling demons, dragons, gods — and his own ego — along the way.

title: Space Pups
description: Two young children and their parents help a trio of aliens transformed as friendly dogs to escape the clutches of a local UFO hunter as they repair their spaceship.

title: Happiness for Beginners
description: At a crossroads after her divorce, a schoolteacher ventures toward a fresh start in life — and love — when she signs up for a grueling group hiking trip.

title: The Venture Bros.: Radiant is the Blood of the Baboon Heart
description: A nationwide manhunt for Hank Venture leads to untold dangers and unexpected revelations, while The Monarch is literally out for Dr Venture's blood. An imposing evil from the past reemerges to wreak havoc on the Ventures, The Guild, and even the Monarch marriage—it will take friends and foes alike to restore the Ventures' world to order… or end it once and for all.

title: Barbie
description: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet: To track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity before it falls into the wrong hands. With control of the future and the fate of the world at stake, and dark forces from Ethan's past closing in, a deadly race around the globe begins. Confronted by a mysterious, all-powerful enemy, Ethan is forced to consider that nothing can matter more than his mission – not even the lives of those he cares about most.

title: Hidden Strike
description: When a China-run oil refinery is attacked in Mosul, Iraq, a Chinese private security contractor is called in to extract the oil workers. He learns, however, that the attackers’ real plan is to steal a fortune in oil, and teams up with an American former Marine to stop them.

title: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
description: Finding himself in a new era, approaching retirement, Indy wrestles with fitting into a world that seems to have outgrown him. But as the tentacles of an all-too-familiar evil return in the form of an old rival, Indy must don his hat and pick up his whip once more to make sure an ancient and powerful artifact doesn't fall into the wrong hands.

title: Nimona
description: A knight framed for a tragic crime teams with a scrappy, shape-shifting teen to prove his innocence. But what if she's the monster he's sworn to destroy?

title: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King
description: As a lionhearted boy who can’t wield magic strives for the title of Wizard King, four banished Wizard Kings of yore return to crush the Clover Kingdom.

title: Adipurush
description: 7000 years ago, Ayodhya's Prince Raghava and Prince Sesh along with the Mighty Vanar Warriors travels to the island of Lanka with an aim to rescue Raghava's wife Janaki, who has been abducted by Lankesh, the king of Lanka.

title: The Flash
description: When his attempt to save his family inadvertently alters the future, Barry Allen becomes trapped in a reality in which General Zod has returned and there are no Super Heroes to turn to. In order to save the world that he is in and return to the future that he knows, Barry's only hope is to race for his life. But will making the ultimate sacrifice be enough to reset the universe?

title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
description: A ‘90s globetrotting adventure that introduces the Maximals, Predacons, and Terrorcons to the existing battle on earth between Autobots and Decepticons.

title: Taz: Quest for Burger
description: After an outlaw abducts her father and steals her town’s food supply, a feisty adolescent bandicoot named Quinn recruits the Tasmanian Devil to help her find the thief. Taz may be an ill-tempered rogue with a fearsome reputation, but he and Quinn will have to work together to track the criminal through the wilds of Tasmania and save her community.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
description: After reuniting with Gwen Stacy, Miles Morales — Brooklyn's full-time, friendly neighborhood Spider-Man — is catapulted across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. But when the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles finds himself pitted against the other Spiders and must redefine what it means to be a hero so he can save the people he loves most.

title: The Little Mermaid
description: The youngest of King Triton’s daughters, and the most defiant, Ariel longs to find out more about the world beyond the sea, and while visiting the surface, falls for the dashing Prince Eric. With mermaids forbidden to interact with humans, Ariel makes a deal with the evil sea witch, Ursula, which gives her a chance to experience life on land, but ultimately places her life – and her father’s crown – in jeopardy.

title: Crater
description: After the death of his father, a boy growing up on a lunar mining colony takes a trip to explore a legendary crater, along with his four best friends, prior to being permanently relocated to another planet.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Volume 3
description: Peter Quill, still reeling from the loss of Gamora, must rally his team around him to defend the universe along with protecting one of their own. A mission that, if not completed successfully, could quite possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.

title: Polite Society
description: Martial artist-in-training Ria Khan believes she must save her older sister Lena from her impending marriage. After enlisting the help of her friends, Ria attempts to pull off the most ambitious of all wedding heists in the name of independence and sisterhood.

title: The Secret Kingdom
description: Verity and Peter’s trip to the old family mansion takes a turn when the floor of their room suddenly gives way and they fall into an underground chamber where they are met by a civilization of creatures. The leader tells them that Peter's arrival was foretold as he’s the one who can use Great Clock of the Citadel to restart time and destroy the Shroud, a malevolent creature who feeds on fear itself...

title: Knights of the Zodiac
description: When a headstrong street orphan, Seiya, in search of his abducted sister unwittingly taps into hidden powers, he discovers he might be the only person alive who can protect a reincarnated goddess, sent to watch over humanity. Can he let his past go and embrace his destiny to become a Knight of the Zodiac?

title: Space Wars: Quest for the Deepstar
description: A father and daughter team of space scavengers race against a band of evil mercenaries to reach a legendary lost freighter called the Deepstar. Along their trek through the universe, they encounter monsters, aliens, robots, and something even worse.

title: Peter Pan & Wendy
description: Wendy Darling, a young girl afraid to leave her childhood home behind, meets Peter Pan, a boy who refuses to grow up. Alongside her brothers and a tiny fairy, Tinker Bell, she travels with Peter to the magical world of Neverland. There, she encounters an evil pirate captain, Captain Hook, and embarks on a thrilling adventure that will change her life forever.

title: Beau Is Afraid
description: A paranoid man embarks on an epic odyssey to get home to his mother.

title: Chupa
description: While visiting family in Mexico, a lonely boy befriends a mythical creature hiding on his grandfather's ranch and embarks on the adventure of a lifetime.

title: Kings of Mulberry Street: Let Love Reign
description: What if the only way Ticky and Baboo can save Granny Chetty from the clutches of the fallen Commander Veerasamy is by pretending to be celebrities from Bollywood?

title: Ride On
description: A washed-up stuntman and his stunt horse become an overnight social media sensation when their real-life fight with debt collectors goes viral.

title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
description: While working underground to fix a water main, Brooklyn plumbers—and brothers—Mario and Luigi are transported down a mysterious pipe and wander into a magical new world. But when the brothers are separated, Mario embarks on an epic quest to find Luigi.

title: The Three Musketeers: D'Artagnan
description: D'Artagnan, a spirited young Gascon, is left for dead after trying to save a noblewoman from being kidnapped. Once in Paris, he tries by all means to find his attackers, unaware that his quest will lead him to the very heart of a war where the future of France is at stake. Aided by King's Musketeers Athos, Porthos and Aramis, he faces the machinations of villainous Cardinal Richelieu and Milady de Winter, while falling in love with Constance, the Queen's confidante.

title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
description: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

title: The Quest for Tom Sawyer's Gold
description: Agatha Armstrong and her trusty sidekick Mrs. Mac were once the world’s most daring adventurers. But when her son Ant came along, everything quickly changed and her devil-may-care ways took a backseat to being over-protective and terrified of anything that posed a risk to her family.

title: Wickensburg
description: A mother and her little kid relocate to a new tiny town. They soon realize that the town is hiding a horrible secret, and it's a race against time to save it.

title: The Portable Door
description:
Overview:
                                                Paul Carpenter is an intern at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employers, including a CEO who wants to disrupt the ancient magical world with modern corporate practices.

title: The Magician's Elephant
description: Peter is searching for his long-lost sister when he crosses paths with a fortune teller in the market square. His one one question is: is his sister still alive? The answer, that he must find a mysterious elephant and the magician who will conjure it, sets Peter off on a journey to complete three seemingly impossible tasks that will change the face of his town forever.

title: Mavka: The Forest Song
description: Mavka — a Soul of the Forest and its Warden — faces an impossible choice between love and her duty as guardian to the Heart of the Forest, when she falls in love with a human — the talented young musician Lukas.

title: We Have a Ghost
description: After Kevin finds a ghost named Ernest haunting his new home, he becomes an overnight social media sensation. But when Kevin and Ernest go rogue to investigate the mystery of the latter's past, they become targets of the CIA.

title: Kill Boksoon
description: At work, she's a renowned assassin. At home, she's a single mom to a teenage daughter. Killing? That's easy. It's parenting that's the hard part.

title: Secret Seam
description: The Secret Seam is a literal rip in the fabric of the universe. Nobody knows what it does, but there are those that are willing to kill others to find it, and the map to its location has just fallen in Jonathon Child's lap.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
description: Superhero duo Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne, together with Hope’s parents Hank Pym and Janet Van Dyne, find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm, interacting with strange new creatures, and embarking on an adventure that will push them beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.

title: True Spirit
description: When the tenacious young sailor Jessica Watson sets out to be the youngest person to sail solo, nonstop and unassisted around the world, many expect her to fail. With the support of her sailing coach and mentor Ben Bryant and her parents, Jessica is determined to accomplish what was thought to be impossible, navigating some of the world’s most challenging stretches of ocean over the course of 210 days.

title: Rock Dog 3: Battle the Beat
description: After touring the world, Bodi takes some time off and returns to his village. When he learns that the girl group, K-9, doesn't know who rock legend Angus Scattergood is, he is compelled to join the musical competition show, “Battle the Beat,” to inspire a new generation of rock stars. But after joining the show, Bodi quickly realizes he has bitten off more than he can chew when he becomes an overnight TV personality sensation.

title: Asterix & Obelix: The Middle Kingdom
description: Gallic heroes and forever friends Asterix and Obelix journey to China to help Princess Sa See save the Empress and her land from a nefarious prince.

title: Pathaan
description: A soldier caught by enemies and presumed dead comes back to complete his mission, accompanied by old companions and foes.

title: Epic Tails
description: An adventurous mouse sets off to battle dangerous creatures in Ancient Greece, including Poseidon.

title: Lupin The 3rd vs. Cat’s Eye
description: Lupin III competes with the Kisugi sisters to steal a triptych of paintings that once belonged to their father, and which hold the key to a long-unsolved mystery.

title: JUNG_E
description: On an uninhabitable 22nd-century Earth, the outcome of a civil war hinges on cloning the brain of an elite soldier to create a robot mercenary.

title: Kids vs. Aliens
description: All Gary wants is to make awesome home movies with his best buds. All his older sister Samantha wants is to hang with the cool kids. When their parents head out of town one Halloween weekend, an all-time rager of a teen house party turns to terror when aliens attack, forcing the siblings to band together to survive the night.

title: SpongeBob SquarePants Presents The Tidal Zone
description: GrandPat travels through alternate dimensions and timelines to get home.

title: Mummies
description:
Overview:
                                                Through a series of unfortunate events, three mummies end up in present-day London and embark on a wacky and hilarious journey in search of an old ring belonging to the Royal Family, stolen by ambitious archaeologist Lord Carnaby.

title: Blueback
description: Based on the best-selling novel by Tim Winton, Blueback is a timely tale about the ocean, a beautiful marine creature, and a young girl’s power to change the world.

title: Mira
description: Near future. Lera Arabova is a 15-year-old girl who lives with her family in Vladivostok. Lera's father has been working at the orbiting space station "Mira" for many years and has long lost contact with his daughter, turning only into a voice on the phone. After a meteor shower hits the city, Lera has only one chance to save her loved ones and the city from a new disaster. Her father helps her in this - through satellite surveillance systems and the telephone, he uses every opportunity to send a message to his daughter, watching from above from the station her every step.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Grudge of Edinburgh Part 1
description: Tristan, the son of Meliodas and Elizabeth, inherits the power of the Goddess Clan and can heal people’s wounds and injuries, but he often ends up hurting others due to his inability to control his Demon Clan power. To protect his family, Tristan heads to Edinburgh Castle and meets a host of new friends along the way.

title: The Amazing Maurice
description: Every town on Discworld knows the stories about rats and pipers, and Maurice - a street wise tomcat - leads a band of educated ratty friends (and a stupid kid) on a nice little earner. Piper plus rats equals lots and lots of money. Until they run across someones playing a different tune. Now Maurice and his rats must learn a new concept: evil...

title: Gold Run
description: Fredrik isn’t the bravest of men, but now he is faced with a great responsibility and an enormous task - to get the entire Norwegian gold reserve away from the Nazis during the invasion of Norway.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Set more than a decade after the events of the first film, learn the story of the Sully family (Jake, Neytiri, and their kids), the trouble that follows them, the lengths they go to keep each other safe, the battles they fight to stay alive, and the tragedies they endure.

title: The Hit
description: Features a bromance with a killer twist.

title: Plebs: Soldiers Of Rome
description: Three Plebs join the army in peace-time, hoping to win respect, romance and military discounts at selected restaurants. But when war's declared they're sent to fight on the front line of a Roman legion for a cause they don't believe in. Now their main interest is the struggle for survival.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
description: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: He has burned through eight of his nine lives, leaving him with only one life left. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.

title: The Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus
description: Christmas Eve takes a twisty turn when the Boss Baby accidentally swaps places with one of Santa's elves and gets stranded at the North Pole.

title: Mighty Express: Mighty Trains Race
description: Trouble on the tracks! Freight Nate gets tricked into participating in a high-speed race — with all the Mighty Express cargo cars at stake!

title: Christmas Ransom
description: When a pair of bumbling crooks hijack the Harrington and Sons toy store, a pair of kids stumble into the heist and are forced to team up with a female security officer to save Christmas.

title: Troll
description: Deep inside the mountain of Dovre, something gigantic awakens after being trapped for a thousand years. Destroying everything in its path, the creature is fast approaching the capital of Norway. But how do you stop something you thought only existed in Norwegian folklore?

title: My Name Is Vendetta
description: After old enemies kill his family, a former mafia enforcer and his feisty daughter flee to Milan, where they hide out while plotting their revenge.

title: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special
description: The Guardians, who are on a mission to make Christmas unforgettable for Quill, head to Earth in search of the perfect present.

title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime the Movie: Scarlet Bond
description: A long-running conspiracy is swirling over a mysterious power wielded by the Queen in Raja, a small country west of Tempest. When a slime who evolved into a Demon Lord named Rimuru Tempest crosses paths with Hiiro, a survivor of the Ogre race, an incredible adventure packed with new characters begins. The power of bonds will be put to the test!

title: Mad Heidi
description:
Overview:
                                                In a dystopian Switzerland that has fallen under the fascist rule of an evil cheese tyrant, Heidi lives the pure and simple life in the Swiss Alps. Grandfather Alpöhi does his best to protect Heidi, but her yearning for freedom soon gets her into trouble with the dictator’s henchmen. The innocent girl transforms herself into a kick-ass female fighting force who sets out to liberate the country from the insane cheese fascists.

title: Strange World
description: A journey deep into an uncharted and treacherous land, where fantastical creatures await the legendary Clades—a family of explorers whose differences threaten to topple their latest, and by far most crucial, mission.

title: Blue's Big City Adventure
description: When Josh gets the opportunity of a lifetime to audition for Rainbow Puppy’s Broadway musical, Josh and Blue skidoo to NYC for the very first time where they meet new friends and discover the magic of music, dance, and following one’s dreams.

title: Slumberland
description: A young girl discovers a secret map to the dreamworld of Slumberland, and with the help of an eccentric outlaw, she traverses dreams and flees nightmares, with the hope that she will be able to see her late father again.

title: The Magic Flute
description: 17-year-old Tim Walker as he travels from London to the Austrian Alps to attend the legendary Mozart boarding school. There, he discovers a centuries-old forgotten passageway into the fantastic world of Mozart's "The Magic Flute."

title: Tom and Jerry Snowman's Land
description: It’s time to chase that holiday spirit with Tom and Jerry! With magic in the air, Jerry and his nephew, Tuffy, make a snow mouse that miraculously comes to life! To keep their new friend, Larry the snow mouse from melting, Tuffy and Jerry must race him to the fabled Snowman’s Village. In hot pursuit, Tom and devious Dr. Doublevay have their own plans for Larry’s magic.

title: Suzume
description: Suzume, 17, lost her mother as a little girl. On her way to school, she meets a mysterious young man. But her curiosity unleashes a calamity that endangers the entire population of Japan, and so Suzume embarks on a journey to set things right.

title: My Father's Dragon
description: Struggling to cope after a move to the city with his mother, Elmer runs away in search of Wild Island and a young dragon who waits to be rescued. Elmer’s adventures introduce him to ferocious beasts, a mysterious island and the friendship of a lifetime.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M’Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T’Challa’s death. As the Wakandans strive to embrace their next chapter, the heroes must band together with the help of War Dog Nakia and Everett Ross and forge a new path for the kingdom of Wakanda.

title: Enola Holmes 2
description: Now a detective-for-hire like her infamous brother, Enola Holmes takes on her first official case to find a missing girl, as the sparks of a dangerous conspiracy ignite a mystery that requires the help of friends — and Sherlock himself — to unravel.

title: Robbing Mussolini
description: At the conclusion of World War II, a black marketeer and a nightclub singer assembled a motley crew of misfits to commit an impossible heist: stealing Mussolini's riches from his headquarters.

title: Operation Seawolf
description: In the latter days of World War II, Germany, desperate for any last chance to defeat the allied nations, resorted to its last available weapons and troops. The German Navy and the last remaining U-boats joined up for one final desperate operation, known as Operation Seawolf, to attack the United States homeland. Captain Hans Kessler, a veteran submarine captain who served in both World Wars, is enlisted to complete a mission and help shift the tide of the battle.

title: Wendell & Wild
description: Two demon brothers enlist the aid of Kat Elliot — a tough teen with a load of guilt — to summon them to the Land of the Living. But what Kat demands in return leads to a brilliantly bizarre and comedic adventure like no other.

title: Titina
description: Seen through the eyes of the street dog that became the world’s first four-legged celebrity who traveled to the North Pole in a Zepplin, Titina tells a true-ish story of glory and defeat.

title: Black Adam
description: Black Adam is set free from his earthly grave and prepared to wreak his special brand of justice on the contemporary world nearly 5,000 years after being endowed with the great powers of the Egyptian gods—and imprisoned just as swiftly.

title: The Curse of Bridge Hollow
description: A Halloween-hating dad reluctantly partners up with his teenage daughter after an evil ghost makes their town's decorations come to life.

title: My Fairy Troublemaker
description:
Overview:
                                                Violetta (337), a curious and cheeky fairy, gets lost in the human world. To find her way back to the fairy world, she teams up with the human girl Maxie (12) and discovers her true destiny.

title: Ghoster
description: Elizabeth and her father find they have acquired Echoville Manor, a large estate with 37 rooms, when a mystery letter shows up on the day they are to be evicted. Elizabeth finds the mansion to be occupied by Ghoster, the prettiest spirit in the entire universe, who has spent fifty years imprisoned there in a mirrored prison. In order to liberate Ghoster before the evil Yuto takes her soul in his pursuit for immortality, they must work together to unravel the mysteries of Echoville.

title: Guardians of Time
description: Four cousins uncover a portal to an unknown place one day in the family manor. They are trapped in this uncovered world, the Kingdom of Keoherus, and must combat the Guardian of Time as well as sinister powers and beasts in order to return home.

title: Monster High: The Movie
description: Monster High is a school for monsters of all shapes and sizes, and Clawdeen Wolf, who is half human and half werewolf, has just lately started going there. Clawdeen believes that she may have at long last found a community in which she may freely be who she is because she has swiftly developed close relationships with two of her fellow students, Frankie Stein and Draculaura. Clawdeen will soon have to learn to accept her genuine monster heart before it is too late since a cunning scheme to bring down Monster High poses a threat to reveal her true identity.

title: Trick or Treat Scooby-Doo!
description: Mystery Inc. has solved the greatest case ever! They have located Coco Diablo, leader of a legendary costume crime ring. With Coco and her cat incarcerated, Mystery Inc. believes they can finally take a rest. Wrong! Halloween is suddenly threatened by the sudden appearance of dangerous doppelganger ghosts of the Scooby gang and cherished old enemies in Coolsville. Now it is up to the interfering children to expose the current villain and save Halloween.

title: The Tyrannosaurus Rex
description: After a power-hungry dinosaur from outside the valley attacks the king of dinosaurs by surprise, a young T-Rex escapes and begins to train, vowing never to return until he is the biggest and bravest in all the land--and finally strong enough to challenge the evil Fang and restore peace to Green Valley.

title: Spirit Halloween: The Movie
description: After discovering that a Spirit Halloween store is haunted, a group of middle school students are challenged to make it through the night.

title: Sanctified
description: An outlaw is rescued from death by a nun who is traveling through the Badlands. She nurses him back to health in exchange for him guiding her to a Church in Williston. A deep friendship develops between these two unlikely people as they learn to work together to survive their dangerous journey.

title: Minions & More Volume 1
description: This compilation of Minions cartoons from the "Despicable Me" franchise including "Training Wheels," "Puppy," and "Yellow Is the New Black."

title: Catherine Called Birdy
description: A adolescent girl in medieval England attempts to avoid the arranged marriages that her father has planned for her.

title: Legacy Peak
description: Jason is on an adventure to win the hearts of Noelle's kids before they marry.

title: Time Pirates
description: Shooting a music video aboard a tall ship, band SM6 discovers a partial treasure map. After reading the incantation on the map, a waterspout emerges and transports the ship back to an era where pirates rule the seven seas. As SM6 searches for a way back home, they run into dread pirate Blackbeard, the fearsome Kraken, and make an alliance with female pirate Anne Bonny.

title: Brahmāstra Part One: Shiva
description: First part of an Indian superhero trilogy.

title: Pinocchio
description: A live-action and CGI recreation of the classic tale of a wooden puppet who begins on an exciting journey to become a boy. Other characters include Geppetto, the woodcarver who creates Pinocchio and treats him as his own son; Jiminy Cricket, Pinocchio's adviser and "conscience"; the Blue Fairy; "Honest" John; Sofia the Seagull; and The Coachman.

title: The Visitor from the Future
description: In a devastated future, the apocalypse threatens the Earth. The last hope lies with a man capable of time travel. His mission: to return to the past and change the course of events. But the time police hunts him down in every era. A race against time begins for the Visitor from the Future...

title: The Skeleton's Compass
description: A group of middle school friends go on the hunt for treasure after finding a skeleton in the woods.

title: Ivy + Bean
description: Ivy and Bean never expected to be friends. Ivy is quiet, intelligent, and perceptive. Bean is energetic, lively, and fearless. However, an experience can sometimes show that opposites can become the best of friends.

title: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Emerald Tablet
description: Tad would love for his archeologist colleagues to accept him as one of their own, but he always messes everything up. Tad accidentally destroys a sarcophagus and unleashes an ancient spell endangering the lives of his friends: Mummy, Jeff and Belzoni. With everyone against him and only helped by Sara, he sets off on an adventure that will take him from Mexico to Chicago and from Paris to Egypt, in order to put an end to the curse of the Mummy.

title: New Gods: Yang Jian
description: Fifteen hundred years after the war of gods, the heaven declined. Yang Jian, the God of Erlang, made a living by working as a catcher. One day, Yang Jian was ordered to hunt down a young man, his own nephew.

title: Vesper
description: Vesper, a 13-year-old girl trying to survive with her disabled Father, is forced to use her wits, strength, and bio-hacking skills to fight for the chance of a future after the collapse of the Earth's environment.

title: Secret Headquarters
description:
Overview:
                                                While hanging out after school, Charlie and his friends discover the headquarters of the world’s most powerful superhero hidden beneath his home. When villains attack, they must team up to defend the headquarters and save the world.

title: The Young Chief Winnetou
description: Winnetou's tribe is in dire straits. There is a threat of famine as the all-important buffalo herds are now failing. As the headman's son, young Winnetou wants to prove to his father Intschu-chuna how brave he is and how great a warrior he can be, because he thinks his son still has a lot to learn. To save his tribe, he goes on a dangerous adventure.

title: One Piece Film Red
description: Uta — the most beloved singer in the world. Her voice, which she sings with while concealing her true identity, has been described as “otherworldly.” She will appear in public for the first time at a live concert. As the venue fills with all kinds of Uta fans — excited pirates, the Navy watching closely, and the Straw Hats led by Luffy who simply came to enjoy her sonorous performance — the voice that the whole world has been waiting for is about to resound.

title: Luck
description: Suddenly finding herself in the never-before-seen Land of Luck, the unluckiest person in the world must unite with the magical creatures there to turn her luck around.

title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Movie
description: When an unknown person from the future shows up with a grim warning, Leo is compelled to take charge of the situation and lead his brothers, Raph, Donnie, and Mikey in a battle to defend the planet from a terrifying alien species.

title: The Railway Children Return
description: During the Second World War, a number of youngsters are separated from their families and sent to live in a village in Yorkshire. While there, they meet a young soldier who, like them, is separated from his family and far from home.

title: Karmalink
description: In this Buddhist sci-fi mystery, a teenage orphan in the slums of Phnom Penh, Cambodia investigates her friend’s past-life visions, uncovering a conspiracy of scientific reincarnation.

title: The Gray Man
description: When Court Gentry, alias Sierra Six, the CIA's most skilled mercenary, discovers dark agency secrets by accident, he becomes a top target and is hunted around the world by his psychotic old colleague Lloyd Hansen and international assassins.

title: Ranveer vs Wild with Bear Grylls
description: Help celebrity Ranveer Singh and explorer Bear Grylls explore the Serbian forest in search of a rare flower by navigating this interactive special.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor embarks on an adventure unlike any he's ever undertaken: a quest for inner peace. But his retirement is cut short by Gorr the God Butcher, a galactic assassin who seeks the annihilation of the gods. To deal with the threat, Thor enlists the help of King Valkyrie, Korg, and his ex-girlfriend Jane Foster, who, much to Thor's surprise, wields his magical hammer, Mjolnir, as the Mighty Thor. They set out on a perilous cosmic journey together to solve the mystery of the God Butcher's vengeance and stop him before it's too late.

title: Jurassic Domination
description: When two armed dinosaurs made by the military attack a small mountain town, it's up to the sheriff to figure out how to stop them before they get away and cause trouble all over the country.

title: I Hear the Trees Whispering
description: Running from his tormented past, a man takes a job in the middle of the woods, only to find his quiet life shattered when it soon turns out nothing around him is what it seems.

title: Birds Like Us
description: A bunch of birds attempt to find a better life for themselves and their loved ones.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Final Alchemy
description: The Elric brothers’ long and winding journey comes to a close in this epic finale, where they must face off against an unworldly, nationwide threat.

title: The Sea Beast
description: When a little child sneaks aboard his ship, the famed sea monster hunter's life is completely flipped upside down.

title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
description: Gru, a fan of a supervillain supergroup known as the Vicious6, devises a scheme to become sufficiently evil in order to join them, with the assistance of his minions.

title: Lightyear
description: Buzz Lightyear, a crew of eager recruits, and his robot sidekick Sox embark on an interplanetary adventure.

title: Erzulie
description: The unexpected appearance of Erzulie, the goddess of the swamp mermaids, puts a damper on a get-together amongst four old friends who had been in touch recently.

title: Satria Dewa: Gatotkaca
description: Realizing that he’s the lineal descendant of Gatotkaca from Pandawa family, Satrio must fight his way to unlock the power lies inside him and face Aswatama, the remaining Kurawa warrior who lives on to destroy the world by changing the history of Bharatayudha.

title: Double Threat
description: A young woman with multiple personalities becomes connected with a man on a cross-country trek to disperse his brother's ashes while being pursued by brutal mobsters.

title: The Siege of Robin Hood
description: In a time of anarchy and oppression, the once-great nation of England teeters perilously on the edge of a widespread revolt. After the ruthless Sheriff of Nottingham orders a terrible attack on his family, a young man named Robin swears bloody vengeance on the perpetrators and vows to deliver freedom to those enslaved by the tyrannical rule of the kingdom. Robin and Lancelot organize a dangerous squad of exiled fighters and skillful mavericks to unite the villagers for an explosive all-out assault on the Crown's castle, with advice and guidance from the recluse magician Merlin.

title: Live Is Life
description: Summer 1985. Rodri makes the journey from Catalonia to Galicia, where he sees his four close pals after being apart for an entire year. The five of them decide to go on a quest during the night in order to find a legendary item. This decision comes at a time when their friendship is beginning to suffer as a result of real-world issues.

title: Jurassic World Dominion
description: Dinosaurs now hunt alongside humans four years after Isla Nublar's destruction. This precarious equilibrium will determine whether humans remain the apex predators on a world they share with history's most terrifying beasts.

title: Mia and Me: The Hero of Centopia
description: Mia realizes that her magic stone is part of an ancient prophesy and starts on a perilous trip to the most remote islands of Centopia to confront a great evil and determine her own fate.

title: Interceptor
description: A lieutenant of the Army uses her years of tactical training to save humanity from sixteen nuclear missiles fired towards the United States, while a savage coordinated attack threatens her remote missile interceptor station.

title: The Bob's Burgers Movie
description: When a damaged water main forms a large sinkhole in front of Bob's Burgers, it permanently blocks the entrance and thwarts the Belchers' summer plans. While Bob and Linda fight to keep their restaurant viable, the children attempt to unravel a riddle that could save the business. As the hazards increase, these underdogs assist each other rediscover hope and struggle to return to their rightful place behind the counter.

title: Sea of Love
description: The sea adventures of Bruda, Bobbi, Wayu, and Puri, four marine animal companions, feature familiar, daily experiences with a touch of enchantment.

title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
description: For the last many decades since the cancellation of their popular television series, Chip has been working as an insurance salesman in the suburbs. Dale, on the other hand, has undergone CGI surgery and works the nostalgia convention circuit in an attempt to recapture his golden days. Chip and Dale must mend their shattered friendship and don their Rescue Rangers investigative personalities once more to save the life of a former cast colleague who goes missing.

title: Dark Cloud
description: Following a horrible injury, a woman submits herself voluntarily to artificial intelligence for rehabilitation.

title: Bubble
description: A talented young man meets a fascinating girl in an abandoned Tokyo overrun by bubbles and gravitational anomalies.

title: The Highwayman
description:
Overview:
                                                Famed highway robber Dick Turpin finds himself on the run in the English countryside having accidentally kidnapped the Earl of Pembroke's feisty daughter, Elizabeth. As her fiance Winthroppe attempts to track them down, Elizabeth begins to fall for the dashing highwayman, leaving Turpin with no choice but to face off against Winthroppe in a fight for Elizabeth's heart - and her fortune.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Dr. Stephen Strange continues his investigation on the Time Stone following the events of Avengers: Endgame and Spider-Man: No Way Home. However, an old friend turned foe aims to destroy every sorcerer on the planet, upsetting Doctor Strange's plans and leading him to unleash a terrible horror.

title: Survive
description: Jane and Paul are the sole survivors after their plane crashes on a lonely, snow-covered mountain and they are forced to battle for their lives. Together, they undertake a perilous adventure out of the forest.

title: The Other Side of Darkness
description: Gifts from a 16-year-old girl lead her and her pals to discover a scheme to breakdown America's power grid in a thrilling adventure.

title: Monkey Enters Lanka
description: When a particular princess vanishes, a mythical folk hero monkey is once again summoned, his name dreaded across the heavens and hells.

title: Barbie: It Takes Two
description: Barbie "Malibu" Roberts and Barbie "Brooklyn" Roberts chase their dreams of musical stardom.

title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
description: In an effort to prevent Grindelwald's plans of raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Amphibian Scamander, who consents to assist, though he's unaware of the threats that lie ahead. Lines are attracted as love as well as commitment are evaluated, even amongst the truest friends and family, in an increasingly split wizarding globe.

title: Dolphin Boy
description: When a plane crashes at sea, dolphins rescue a little boy and raise him as family. He lives a carefree life beneath the waves until an evil monster seizes power over the underwater world. The boy is banished to dry land, where a kind-hearted captain takes him in. With the captain’s help, the boy sets out on a journey to solve the mystery of his true identity.

title: Dakota
description: Dakota, an ex-service dog, lives on the family farm with single mother Kate (Cornish) and her daughter Alex (Sultan). Dakota swiftly adjusts to her new surroundings and establishes herself as a local hero, becoming inseparable from Alex. When the farm's survival is challenged by the town's unscrupulous sheriff, Dakota must join together with the family to rescue the land.

title: The Northman
description: Prince Amleth is on the verge of becoming a man when his father is assassinated brutally by his uncle, who also kidnaps the boy's mother. Amleth is now a Viking on a quest to rescue his mother, assassinate his uncle, and revenge his father two decades later.

title: Escape Through Africa
description:
Overview:
                                                In 1914, a British nurse, Anne (Linn Bjørnland), escapes an attack on her outpost in Africa. Hunted by a German-led war party, and with help from her uncle, an Army Captain (Eric Roberts), and local warriors, she embarks on an epic journey across the African hill country. She must balance bravery with her pacifist ideals to deliver a native girl safely to her mother, reunite with her husband, and save a neighboring outpost from a massacre.

title: The Adventures of Maid Marian
description: Everyone knows Robin Hood and Maid Marian, but this is the story of what occurs afterward. She returns from the shadows to defend her people from Sheriff of Nottingham's reign of tyranny. When Marian finds out that Robin Hood is still at war, she must put her own fighting talents to the test, establishing a new legend that will live on through the years.

title: Apollo 10½:  A Space Age Childhood
description: A male tells stories of his life as a 10-year-old child in 1969 Houston, weaving tales of fond memories with a fantastical account of a journey to the moon.

title: The Lost City
description: Complies with a reclusive love storyteller who made certain nothing could be even worse than obtaining stuck on a book trip with her cover version, until a kidnapping attempt sweeps them both into a ruthless jungle experience, proving life can be a lot complete stranger, as well as much more charming, than any one of her book fictions.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
description:
Overview:
                                                When an interdimensional rupture unravels reality, an unlikely hero must channel her newfound powers to fight bewildering dangers from the multiverse, as the fate of everything hangs in the balance.

title: Finnick
description: Not many people know that every house is inhabited by finns. They are furry creatures that appear in human world to take care of a house and keep the hearth. Finnick is a young Finn, who doesn't seem to care about his responsibility of making a home out of the house. He is just making pranks on «his people» and that is the reason why none of the families wanted to stay long in his house. Everything changes when a new family comes to his house, where Finnick's tricks do not work at all, and he meets 13-year old Christine and inexplicable events begin to happen in the city. Finnick and Christine, who are so different, will have to team up and work together to solve the mystery of the events and save the city.

title: Dragon Knight
description: Several years after the battle has been lost, and all the dragons slaughtered, a single knight takes a trip the lands of Agonos seeking to raise a military versus the devil lord Abaddon. When a healer's vision discloses that one dragon still lives, as well as together with an excited young squire, the knight sets off looking for the legendary creature. As the armies of Abaddon descend on the human kingdoms, the dragon is their last resort of repeling the horde, prior to it desolates the lands of males. But does the animal also exist? As well as if it does, will it fight for them once again?

title: Rabbit Academy
description: The bunny school is in disarray: Leo, the crafty big city bunny, wishes to destroy Easter and allies himself with the foxes to accomplish this. Can Max, Emmi, and their buddies, the young Easter bunnies, avert this outcome? They practice the enigmatic "power bundle" with the knowledgeable Madame Hermione and discover what it truly means to trust someone - even a fox.

title: Journey with Tarsilinha
description: Tarsilinha sets off on a journey to save her mother’s memory. The only way to do this is to find her mom's stolen keepsakes and overcome her own fears.

title: The Adam Project
description: After inadvertently crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling competitor pilot Adam Reed join his 12-year-old self on an objective to save the future.

title: The Fourth Musketeer
description: At the request of his papa, young d'Artagnan travels from country Gascony to Paris, where he comes to be embroiled in a sneaky plot in between the King's Musketeers and also the Guardsmen of Cardinal Richelieu.

title: The Mystery of Lop Nur
description: The movie generally tells about the peculiar situations in the Lop Nur location during the Republic of China. Shi Chuqi, the president of the mysterious event examination organization "Seven Sons", led the employee to solve the secret. The film focuses on lots of mystical and also unsettled occasions based upon elements such as checking out the unknown as well as exposing the fact. It additionally includes sci-fi components of ancient room world to please the audience's inquisitiveness.

title: Lotawana
description: A monotonous life has actually pushed the unsatisfied Forrest (Todd Blubaugh) to a trip of self-discovery by living aboard his sailboat on an alluring, Missouri lake. Soon he captures wind of the rebellious as well as free-spirited Everly (Nicola Collie) as well as their radical desires align for a thrilling and also thought-provoking, romantic journey. Can they endure, reconnect with nature and also revise their own regulations of contemporary presence, or will they discover that society runs the method it provides for a factor?

title: Chickenhare and the Hamster of Darkness
description: Young Chickenhare is the adopted son of King Peter, a famous adventurer. He has a difficult time growing up because he is part chicken and part hare and disguises himself as a hare to avoid the mockeries of his peers. When the Royal Adventurer Society trials arrive, Chickenhare fails miserably due to his disguise. But he is determined to seize a second chance and find the Scepter of the Dark Hamster before his evil Uncle Lapin. The holder of the Scepter will wield enormous power. If Lapin obtains it, he will be unstoppable. He embarks on an epic and initiatory quest with his faithful servant Abe, a sarcastic turtle, and Meg, a martial arts expert skunk.

title: King
description: King, a trafficked lion cub, escapes from the airport and takes refuge with Inès and Alex, who then have the crazy idea of getting him back to Africa. Anything can happen when Max their kooky grandfather, decides to join the adventure.

title: Malazgirt 1071
description: The story of the war, which is the beginning of the history of Turks in Anatolia.

title: King of Killers
description: Garan is a part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that they're the ones being hunted.

title: Quicksand
description: A married couple on the brink of divorce becomes trapped in quicksand while hiking through a Colombian rainforest. It’s a struggle for survival as they battle the elements of the jungle and must work together in order to escape.

title: The Good Mother
description: A journalist and his pregnant girlfriend attempt to track down those responsible for the murder of his estranged son. Together, they confront a world of drugs and corruption in the underbelly of their small city in upstate New York, where they uncover an even darker secret.

title: Design Down Under
description: While juggling a family of four, husband and wife design build team, Richie Morris and Georgia Ezra, create one-of-a-kind, modern designs and bespoke spaces for their clients in Melbourne, Australia.

title: All Fun and Games
description: Two kids play a game with their sadistic older cousin and awaken a cruel entity knows as "The Skarrow."

title: Slotherhouse
description: Wanting to have a killer year, sorority sister Emily Young realizes she might just be the best option for her sorority. While beginning her campaign, she finds an adorable sloth that steals her heart and soon realizes she just might steal the hearts, and votes, of her sorority sisters. But when bodies slowly begin to pile up in the Sigma Lambda Theta house, Emily and her sorority sisters realize the deaths are being caused by their new house mascot, the cuddly sloth Alpha. Will Emily and her sisters escape the house with their lives? Or is this death-sloth with three razor sharp claws too quick for them?

title: The Equalizer 3
description: Robert McCall finds himself at home in Southern Italy but he discovers his friends are under the control of local crime bosses. As events turn deadly, McCall knows what he has to do: become his friends' protector by taking on the mafia.

title: Vanished in Yosemite
description: While vacationing in Yosemite, sisters Katrina and Jennifer meet the perfect guy: handsome Rick. Smitten, Katrina is certain she has met Mr. Right; however, when Katrina goes missing deep in the Yosemite wilderness, Jennifer suspects kidnapping and sets out to rescue her sister.

title: The Dive
description: Two sisters go diving at a beautiful, remote location. One of the sisters is struck by a rock, leaving her trapped 28 meters below. With dangerously low levels of oxygen and cold temperatures, it is up to her sister to fight for her life.

title: Hostile Forces
description: After discovering a fortune in stolen contraband, a military veteran and his family must run from a hit squad in a desperate fight for survival.

title: Twisted Neighbor
description: A young woman moves into a gossipy neighborhood that is obsessed with a “Next Door”-type app. When a neighbor suddenly vanishes, the group chat pinpoints her as the prime suspect.

title: Retribution
description: When a mysterious caller puts a bomb under his car seat, Matt Turner begins a high-speed chase across the city to complete a specific series of tasks. With his kids trapped in the backseat and a bomb that will explode if they get out of the car, an everyday commute becomes a twisted game of life or death as Matt follows the stranger’s increasingly dangerous instructions in a race against time to save his family.

title: Hiding from My Husband
description: Fleeing her abusive husband Peter , Jess takes their son Noah and finds refuge in her sister’s place in LA. Yet a paranoid Jess keeps thinking she sees Peter following her everywhere and can’t shake him. When Peter is unexpectedly pronounced dead in an accident, Jess thinks she is finally free of him yet sights of him still persist.

title: Her Deadly Night in Paris
description: An American exchange student in Paris falls in love with her host family's handsome son, but when she witnesses a murder, the couple must go on the run to prove her innocence.

title: The Engineer
description: As Israel is rocked by a series of terrorist bombings, a US senator's daughter is killed in one bloody explosion. Now, ex-Mossad agent Etan must lead an elite, covert team of agents and mercenaries to find the man responsible—the elusive “Engineer.” Can they find and destroy the madman before more innocent lives are lost?

title: Birth/Rebirth
description: A single mother and a childless morgue technician are bound together by their relationship to a little girl they have reanimated from the dead.

title: Catfish Murder
description: Doing her best to balance a successful career with family life, a single mom's world spirals out of control when her shy teenage son is arrested for the murder of a young woman he met online.

title: Ruined
description: When a woman seeks counseling to save her marriage, she has no idea that her therapist shares a secret past with her husband and is out for revenge. In this psychological thriller, no one can trust anyone, and one of them may not survive.

title: Trapped in the Cabin
description: Rebecca Collins, a writer seeking inspiration, is sent to a remote cabin by her editor. There, she falls for the charming handyman, but his sudden disappearance and an unsettling sense of being watched cast a shadow on her trip.

title: Abducted by My Teacher: The Elizabeth Thomas Story
description: The story of Elizabeth Thomas, a 15-year-old high school student who was groomed and abducted by teacher Tad Cummins.

title: Inside Man
description: After a meltdown, a demoted detective is given the opportunity to go undercover and take down the mob's most ruthless killer, but his life and only chance at redemption spiral out of control as he loses himself in the role.

title: Living Next to Danger
description: Charity begins at home is a sentiment Roxanne Robinson soon comes to regret when her teenage daughter goes missing and suspicion falls on her new neighbors Ella and Lucy who have been rehomed in the garden of Roxanne’s perfect family home.

title: Dark Windows
description: A group of teenagers take a trip to an isolated summerhouse in the countryside. What starts as a peaceful getaway turns into a horrific nightmare when a masked man begins to terrorize them in the most gruesome ways.

title: Cruel Encounters
description: After the founder of a huge holding company dies in a mysterious helicopter crash, his wife, son and daughter jockey for the reins of his company in a struggle that involves deception, intrigue and murder.

title: Heart of Stone
description: An intelligence operative for a shadowy global peacekeeping agency races to stop a hacker from stealing its most valuable — and dangerous — weapon.

title: Mommy's Stolen Memories
description: Mallory's life turns upside-down after her young son, Billy, is drawn to Samantha, a strange woman who whispers to him at the local climbing gym. Billy refuses to reveal what she said, and now he’s acting up, Samantha is spying on her, and her husband, Reese, is behaving like he is hiding a secret from her. Little does Mallory know, because of memory loss, that she kidnapped Billy from his mother years ago.

title: The Passenger
description: Randolph Bradley is perfectly content fading into the background, but when his coworker Benson snaps and goes on a violent killing spree, he’s forced to face his fears and confront his troubled past in order to find a way to survive.

title: The Collective
